name: Steel Division 2
summary: Steel Division 2 is an upcoming real-time strategy video game set during Operation Bagration. The game is being developed by Eugen Systems, and will be published independently. Steel Division 2 will be the sequel to the 2017 game Steel Division: Normandy 44.
info:
• 中文名: 钢铁之师 2
  • 开发: Eugen Systems
  • 发行: Paradox Interactive
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 即时战略
  • 游戏引擎: IrisZoom
  • 游玩人数: 1~20
  • 发行日期: 2019年6月18日
  • 官方网站: https://www.steeldivision2.com/
